list.name: Changes
list.comment: Refactored tasks and projects handling: - Implemented React components for tasks and projects pages. - Adjusted filtering logic for tasks by status (NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED). - Fixed routing and ensured tasks display correctly based on project ID or name. - Improved structure and error handling in tasks and project lists.

task.summary:
Add Maven support and refactor Spring Boot setup
Removed old Main.java and added a structured Spring Boot setup in new directories. Introduced pom.xml to manage dependencies and project configuration. Updated .gitignore rules and adjusted IntelliJ project files accordingly.
Lombok is imported to automatically create getters and setters

Implement password hashing and role-based access control
- Added BCrypt password hashing for user passwords in UserService - Configured role-based access control in SecurityConfig - Restricted POST requests to resources based on ADMIN role - Allowed users to access GET requests for public resources
Page controller added. Creating tasks through the interface

Refactor templates and enhance user and project services
Replaced `tasks.html` with new templates and introduced `base.html` for consistent layout. Added methods to services for handling current user and project-specific queries, transitioning `PageController` and `ProjectController` to constructor-based injection.

Add project-specific query methods and update templates
Implemented methods to fetch projects by name and user ID in `ProjectService` and `ProjectRepository`. Refactored `PageController` to use project names instead of IDs for task management. Enhanced `Project`, `Task`, and `User` models for better data integrity and management, and updated Thymeleaf templates to improve user interaction and interface consistency.

feat: Added React and revamped the Projects page
- Installed and configured React for the project. - Integrated frontend with backend using Webpack and Babel. - Implemented React components: ProjectList and ProjectCard to display the project list. - Added styles for components (ProjectList.css and ProjectCard.css). - Updated the Projects controller: - Added a method to retrieve both created and joined projects for the user. - Changed the data handling for the /projects endpoint. - Redesigned the /projects page: - Adjusted layout to split the page into two columns (created projects and joined projects). - Added hover animation to project cards for better user interaction.
All changes have been tested, and the interface works correctly.

feat: Added React and revamped the Projects page
- Installed and configured React for the project. - Integrated frontend with backend using Webpack and Babel. - Implemented React components: ProjectList and ProjectCard to display the project list. - Added styles for components (ProjectList.css and ProjectCard.css). - Updated the Projects controller: - Added a method to retrieve both created and joined projects for the user. - Changed the data handling for the /projects endpoint. - Redesigned the /projects page: - Adjusted layout to split the page into two columns (created projects and joined projects). - Added hover animation to project cards for better user interaction.
All changes have been tested, and the interface works correctly.

feat: Added React and revamped the Projects page
- Installed and configured React for the project. - Integrated frontend with backend using Webpack and Babel. - Implemented React components: ProjectList and ProjectCard to display the project list. - Added styles for components (ProjectList.css and ProjectCard.css). - Updated the Projects controller: - Added a method to retrieve both created and joined projects for the user. - Changed the data handling for the /projects endpoint. - Redesigned the /projects page: - Adjusted layout to split the page into two columns (created projects and joined projects). - Added hover animation to project cards for better user interaction.
All changes have been tested, and the interface works correctly.

Refactored tasks and projects handling: - Implemented React components for tasks and projects pages. - Adjusted filtering logic for tasks by status (NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED). - Fixed routing and ensured tasks display correctly based on project ID or name. - Improved structure and error handling in tasks and project lists.

Refactored tasks and projects handling: - Implemented React components for tasks and projects pages. - Adjusted filtering logic for tasks by status (NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED). - Fixed routing and ensured tasks display correctly based on project ID or name. - Improved structure and error handling in tasks and project lists.

MESSAGE.value: Conflict resolved

Add Maven support and refactor Spring Boot setup
Removed old Main.java and added a structured Spring Boot setup in new directories. Introduced pom.xml to manage dependencies and project configuration. Updated .gitignore rules and adjusted IntelliJ project files accordingly.
Repositories created
Lombok is imported to automatically create getters and setters
Table names changed
Services are created

Implement password hashing and role-based access control
- Added BCrypt password hashing for user passwords in UserService - Configured role-based access control in SecurityConfig - Restricted POST requests to resources based on ADMIN role - Allowed users to access GET requests for public resources
Page controller added. Creating tasks through the interface

Create base structure for task and project management
Added templates for tasks and projects, including base template file. Implemented UserService and ProjectService with necessary repository queries. Deleted unused files and updated workspace settings.

Update project structure and templates for new features
Deleted obsolete templates and configuration files, including .idea/modules.xml and old tasks.html. Added new Thymeleaf templates for base layout, project creation, and tasks, as well as new JavaScript and CSS files for frontend enhancements. Also refactored user and project services to improve code maintainability and added a method for fetching projects by user ID.

Add project and task management templates
Replaced existing task management templates with new ones for consistent project and task management. Updated UserService and ProjectService with additional methods for retrieving current user ID and user-specific projects. Added JavaScript and CSS for the new UI.

Refactor and enhance template structure
Replaced individual task and project templates with a base template for consistency. Updated UserService and ProjectService with new methods, and refactored controllers to use constructor injection.

Add project name-based task management and update templates
Implemented project name-based methods in ProjectService and updated controllers to use these methods. Enhanced `Project`, `Task`, and `User` models for better data integrity and management, and refactored Thymeleaf templates to improve user interaction and interface consistency.

Add project and task management by name and user
Introduced methods to fetch projects by name and user ID in `ProjectService` and `ProjectRepository`. Updated `PageController` methods to use project names instead of IDs, ensuring tasks are associated correctly. Enhanced models and templates for better user experience.

Refactor templates and enhance user and project services
Replaced `tasks.html` with new templates and introduced `base.html` for consistent layout. Added methods to services for handling current user and project-specific queries, transitioning `PageController` and `ProjectController` to constructor-based injection.

Add project-specific retrieval and task management endpoints
Introduced a method in `ProjectService` to retrieve projects by name and user ID. Updated `PageController` to utilize project names in task-related endpoints and made various enhancements to models and templates for improved functionality and consistency.

Add project-specific query methods and update templates
Implemented methods to fetch projects by name and user ID in `ProjectService` and `ProjectRepository`. Refactored `PageController` to use project names instead of IDs for task management. Enhanced `Project`, `Task`, and `User` models for better data integrity and management, and updated Thymeleaf templates to improve user interaction and interface consistency.

feat: Added React and revamped the Projects page
- Installed and configured React for the project. - Integrated frontend with backend using Webpack and Babel. - Implemented React components: ProjectList and ProjectCard to display the project list. - Added styles for components (ProjectList.css and ProjectCard.css). - Updated the Projects controller: - Added a method to retrieve both created and joined projects for the user. - Changed the data handling for the /projects endpoint. - Redesigned the /projects page: - Adjusted layout to split the page into two columns (created projects and joined projects). - Added hover animation to project cards for better user interaction.
All changes have been tested, and the interface works correctly.

Refactor backend for React integration and API-based data handling
- Removed Thymeleaf-related logic from PageController. - Simplified PageController to handle routing only for React components. - Migrated project and task creation logic to REST controllers (ProjectController and TaskController). - Added REST endpoints for creating and updating projects and tasks. - Updated React components (AddTask, TasksPage, CreateProject) to use REST API. - Improved consistency of client-server interaction with a clear API structure.

Refactored tasks and projects handling: - Implemented React components for tasks and projects pages. - Adjusted filtering logic for tasks by status (NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED). - Fixed routing and ensured tasks display correctly based on project ID or name. - Improved structure and error handling in tasks and project lists.

option.value: Refactored tasks and projects handling: - Implemented React components for tasks and projects pages. - Adjusted filtering logic for tasks by status (NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED). - Fixed routing and ensured tasks display correctly based on project ID or name. - Improved structure and error handling in tasks and project lists.
